siteMetadata.title: expatty
siteMetadata.description: Your expat and travelling directory in Andalusia that helps you to find and pick interesting places, events and attractions in one search

node.excerpt: A couple of months after moving into a finca in the campo, I felt sorry for a pregnant mother cat and her four kittens who eventually emerged from the olive grove. She appeared well before them and all the more frequently when I started leaving food out for her. Today, the four kittens, one male and three females, are now semi-domesticated due to our care. The mother remains unapproachable but still turns up daily for food, along with her gang of other stray cats, around four of them - possibly…

frontmatter.title: The stray cat colonies of Andalusia 2
frontmatter.author: Mariska Grobler
